name: Death Before Dishonour
overview: You have been chosen as the best of the best, your mission is to escort this power unit to your Gamma Hydra base 6. The unit is fitted with it's own power source, so you must protect the power unit from any hostile forces you may encounter along the way, it also has it's own shield but can only withstand 100 hits before it is destryoed, Good Luck soldiers!
